channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Unity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Unity

item.title: CVE-2024-22230|2024-08-19T14:40:25.778Z -- dell -- unity
item.description: Dell Unity, versions prior to 5.4, contains a Cross-site scripting vulnerability. An authenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, stealing session information, masquerading as the affected user or carry out any actions that this user could perform, or to generally control the victim's browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-0168|2024-08-19T14:39:25.382Z -- dell -- unity
item.description: Dell Unity, versions prior to 5.4, contains a Command Injection Vulnerability in svc_oscheck utility. An authenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the ability to inject arbitrary operating system commands. This vulnerability allows an authenticated attacker to execute commands with root privileges.
